text: Woh wahan cheekh cheekh kar kahenge ke “Aey hamare Rubb humein yahan se nikal le taa-ke hum neik amal karein, un aamaal se mukhtalif jo pehle karte rahey thay.” (unhein jawab diya jayega) “Kya humne tumko itni umar na di thi ji mein koi sabaq lena chahta to sabaq le sakta tha? Aur tumhare paas mutanabbeh (warn) karne wala bhi aa chuka tha. Ab maza chakkho. Zaalimon ka yahan koi madadgaar nahin hai
